Description of incident: A student discovered a document with sensitive information in an unsecured folder. It contained names, Social Security numbers, student ID numbers and financial aid information.  Around 11,000 current and former Chapman students, 1,900 applicants and an unspecified number of Brandman students were affected.  Only students and people affiliated with the University could have accessed the file, and it appears that the student who reported the incident was the only one who accessed the file.
